meanings.definition: The quality or state of being homogeneous.
meanings.sent1: The homogeneity of the group made it easy for everyone to get along.
meanings.sent2: The homogeneity of the paint color made it simple to match the walls.
meanings.sent3: The homogeneity of the cookie dough made it look like a perfectly round ball.
meanings.sent4: The homogeneity of the forest created a sense of peace and tranquility.
meanings.sent5: The homogeneity of the puzzle pieces made it easy to fit them together.

meanings.definition: The state of having a uniform structure or composition.
meanings.sent1: The homogeneity of the mixture ensured even distribution of ingredients.
meanings.sent2: The homogeneity of the fabric made it easy to sew without any bumps.
meanings.sent3: The homogeneity of the music playlist kept everyone dancing all night.
meanings.sent4: The homogeneity of the sky at sunset painted a beautiful picture.
meanings.sent5: The homogeneity of the team's uniforms made them look professional and united.
